# Class fields InvoicesCode.InvoiceClass_number=Número da fatura InvoicesCode.InvoiceClass_customer_user=Cliente InvoicesCode.InvoiceClass_customer_company=Nome da empresa do cliente InvoicesCode.InvoiceClass_customer_name=Nome do cliente InvoicesCode.InvoiceClass_customer_address=Endereço do cliente ### Missing: InvoicesCode.InvoiceClass_date=Date InvoicesCode.InvoiceClass_product=Produto/Serviço InvoicesCode.InvoiceClass_price=Preço (excluindo impostos) InvoicesCode.InvoiceClass_vat=IVA InvoicesCode.InvoiceClass_currency=Moeda ### Missing: InvoicesCode.InvoiceClass_extra=Extra InvoicesCode.InvoiceClass_type=Tipo InvoicesCode.InvoiceClass_type_invoice=Fatura InvoicesCode.InvoiceClass_type_reimbursement=Reembolso InvoicesCode.InvoiceCustomerClass_customer_user=Cliente (outro usuário) InvoicesCode.InvoiceCustomerClass_customer_email=E-mail do cliente InvoicesCode.InvoiceCustomerClass_customer_address=Endereço do cliente InvoicesCode.InvoiceCustomerClass_customer_name=Nome do cliente InvoicesCode.InvoiceCustomerClass_customer_company=Nome da empresa do cliente InvoicesCode.InvoiceProductClass_product=Produto/Serviço InvoicesCode.InvoiceProductClass_price=Preço InvoicesCode.InvoiceProductClass_vat=IVA InvoicesCode.InvoiceProductTemplateClass_product=Produto/Serviço InvoicesCode.InvoiceProductTemplateClass_price=Preço (excluindo impostos) InvoicesCode.InvoiceProductTemplateClass_vat=IVA InvoicesCode.InvoiceProductTemplateClass_type=Tipo InvoicesCode.InvoiceProductTemplateClass_type_invoice=Fatura InvoicesCode.InvoiceProductTemplateClass_type_reimbursement=Reembolso

# UI invoices.description=Aplicativo para gerenciar e criar novas faturas (ou reembolsos). Também produz notificações por correio sobre novas faturas. invoices.actions=Ações invoices.actions.invoice=Nova fatura invoices.actions.invoice.empty=Vazio invoices.actions.reimbursement=Novo reembolso invoices.actions.reimbursement.empty=Vazio invoices.invoices=Faturas
